  • public class LtnLinearConstraintTerm
extends LinearConstraintTerm
    A LinearConstraintTerm that supports smart initialization for latent topic networks.

      • project

        protected void project()
        Finds the orthogonal projection onto the hyperplane
        argmin stepSize/2 * \|x - z + y / stepSize \|_2^2
        such that coeffs^T * x = constant

        Stores the result in x.
